posts.title: Connection fittings
posts.content:
It is used to connect pipes, connect valves, flaps or other pipe parts.
Fitting is a detachable connection consisting of a threaded neck, conical neck, nut and seal, it can be supplemented with a blind nut. It is available in sizes DN 10 - DN 150. Types of supplied fittings: DIN, ISO, SMS, Hygienic DIN 11853, Aseptic DIN 11864.
Clamp joint is an easily detachable joint, connected by a stainless steel sleeve, types of clamp connections: DIN, SMS
Flange connection is a detachable connection, which is connected by screws
Types of connecting flanges: flat flanges PN10, neck flanges PN10, PN 16, Hygienic
neck flanges PN 10 (DIN 11853), Aseptic neck flanges PN 10 (DIN 11864)
Hose extensions serve as hose ends and allow the connection of two hoses, or as a transition between pipe and hose.
< b> Garola joint is a simple joint of pipes or hoses made of sheet metal by pressing.
